modal.title: Application Error
modal.info: The backend does not answer as expected. Please check, if your archiva service is running. See detail messages below.

http.unknownError: We got a bad response from the backend REST service. Maybe the connection is broken, or the service is down. Please check your network to the backend service and the archiva.log for any errors.
http.permissionDenied: You are not allowed to access the data from the backend service. Try to login again and/or check your permissions.

api.user.password.violation.length: You must provide a password between {arg0} and {arg1} characters in length.
api.user.password.violation.alpha: You must provide a password containing at least {arg0} alphabetic {arg0, plural, one {character} other {characters}}.
api.user.password.violation.numeric: You must provide a password containing at least {arg0} numeric {arg0, plural, one {character} other {characters}}.
api.user.password.violation.reuse: The password must not match any of the previous {arg0} {arg0, plural, one {password} other {passwords}}.
api.user.password.violation.alphanum.only: You must provide a password containing all alpha-numeric characters.
api.user.password.violation.whitespace.detec: You must provide a password without whitespace characters.

small.user_id: Must be a unique key with at least {minSize} characters. No spaces allowed.
small.full_name: This is the display name of the user

add.head: Add User
add.errortitle2: Please check the following error messages:

small.password: If the password field is empty, it will not be updated.

modal.title: Delete User
modal.text:
Are you sure?
Do you want to delete the user {user_id}?

edit.head: Edit/View Role
edit.noUsersAssigned: There are no users assigned to this role
edit.assignUserSearch: Search and assign users to this role
edit.assignGroupSearch: Search and assign a group to this role
edit.groupSearchFailed: Sorry, could not get any groups

errors.userAssignFailed: Could not assign role {role_id} to user {user_id}: {message}
errors.groupAssignFailed: Could not assign role {role_id} to group {group_name}: {message}

base.head: Base Configuration
base.title: Configure base security settings
base.head_managers: Set the used User and RBAC managers
base.explain_user_manager: User managers are binding your User IDs and authentication to a persistent storage or repository. You may combine them, but you have to ensure, that user IDs are unique over all repositories.
base.explain_rbac_manager: RBAC managers handle roles and permissions and store them persistently. If you use LDAP, the roles are mapped to LDAP groups.
base.submit_success: The Changes were submitted successfully. A restart may be required to activate the changes.
base.submit_error: There was an error during submit: {error}
base.submit_active_empty: There must be at least on active User and RBAC Manager defined

ldap.head: LDAP Configuration
ldap.explain: Settings for the LDAP connection. These settings are only used, if LDAP User Manager and/or LDAP RBAC Manager is activated.
ldap.check_success: The LDAP settings have been verified successfully
ldap.check_failed: Could not connect to the LDAP server successfully
ldap.submit_success: The LDAP settings have been updated
ldap.submit_error: Could not update the LDAP settings: {error}

attributes.bind_authenticator_enabled: Use LDAP Bind for Archiva authentication
attributes.use_role_name_as_group: Archiva role names are LDAP group names
attributes.writable: Bind User can write to LDAP Server

attdesc.port: Port, on which the LDAP server is listening (389, 636, ...)
attdesc.base_dn: The Base DN used during bind and ldap queries
attdesc.groups_base_dn: The full DN used as base for searching groups
attdesc.bind_dn: The name or DN of the bind user, which is used to query the LDAP server
attdesc.bind_password: The password to use for binding to the LDAP server
attdesc.authentication_method: The method used to bind to the LDAP server. If strong is used, you may have to set additional properties.
attdesc.bind_authenticator_enabled: If true, LDAP query and bind is used for Archiva Login.
attdesc.use_role_name_as_group: If true, each role as a LDAP group with the same name
attdesc.writable: If true, attributes in the LDAP server can be modified
attdesc.ssl_enabled: If true, SSL/TLS is used for connecting to the LDAP server. You may have to add certificates to the keystore.
attdesc.context_factory: The LDAP JNDI Context Factory to use
attdesc.properties: Add additional environment properties for creating the initial directory context

properties.head: Properties
properties.edit_error: Could not save the property value: {error}

cache.head: Cache Settings
cache.explain: Lifetime and storage settings for the User Cache
cache.submit_success: The cache settings have been updated successfully
cache.submit_error: Could not update the cache setting: {error}

attdesc.time_to_idle_seconds: Entries will be discarded, if they are not used for this time.
attdesc.time_to_live_seconds: Entries will be discarded after this time.
attdesc.max_entries_in_memory: Maximum number of entries that are kept in memory
attdesc.max_entries_on_disk: Maximum number of entries that will be persistently stored on disk

error.required: Value is empty. This is required.
